content.question: How did Ma Liang escape from captivity?

choices.label: He rode away on a horse that came to life after he painted it.
He was released after he painted what his captor demanded.
He set fire to the storeroom where he was imprisoned.
He bribed a guard with one of his paintings.

content.answer: He rode away on a horse that came to life after he painted it.
